In a softball exchange with Iranian Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif on Sunday ’s Face the Nation , CBS anchor Margaret Brennan fretted that President Trump ’s nomination of [ARG1: CIA Director Mike Pompeo] to [V: be] [ARG2: Secretary of State] and his appointment of former United Nations Ambassador John Bolton as National Security Advisor would “ make military confrontation more likely ” between
